summary: Brings the Silence enchantment to Skyrim. Turn powerful mages into robe wearing sissies!
descriptionHtml:
One of my favourite enchantments from Oblivion, now working in Skyrim. Silence blocks the target from casting spells for a short duration.

Standard weapon template scattered through the random loot lists.
I built this mod as an exercise in using the CK.

Note: Mages equipped with a staff can still use them, Silence only prevents them from using their own Magicka pool.

Also great for Vampires, as Silence prevents them from healing themselves at your expense.
author: Doombull
